command.language.desc.content:
Change the bots language for this guild
**Currently supported languages:** `english`, `german`
command.language.prompt.start:
Please give me a valid language.
List of available languages:
`english`
`german`
 
Or if you'd like to help translate LAL: 
`contribute`
 
You can either send it now or you can `re-type` the command.
command.language.prompt.retry:
Please give me a valid language.
List of available languages:
`english`
`german`
 
Or if you'd like to help translate LAL: 
`contribute`
 
You can either send it now or you can `re-type` the command.
command.language.currentLang.desc2: To set a different language use
command.language.contEmbed.desc:
If you'd like to contribute to the translation of LAL you can 
edit the `english.json` file into your language and submit 
it for review in our [support server](https://discord.gg/v8zkSc9).

command.ping.desc.content: Shows the bot message latency and API latency
command.slowmode.desc.content:
Set a custom slowmode time for any channel
**NOTE:** You have to provide the time in seconds
command.slowmode.prompt.start:
Please only provide numbers (10 not 10s). 
You can either send it now or you can `re-type` the command.
command.slowmode.prompt.retry:
Please only provide numbers (10 not 10s). 
You can either send it now or you can `re-type` the command.
command.slowmode.embed.title:
The slowmode timer should not 
exceed or be equal to `21600`s `(6h)`
command.slowmode.embed.desc:
Please `edit` the message or `re-send` the command.
 
Unfortunately this limit cannot be bypassed 
anymore because of Discord limitations.

command.config.desc.content:
Change how the bot works 
by sending one of these sub-commands:

`antiadvert` **NEW**
`language`
`logs`
`prefix`
`staffrole`

command.config.tooltip.noLogs: Logs Channel has not been set.

This is all the possible settings you can edit
to change the behaviour of
command.config.embed.desc2: **INFO:** To change any of these settings use
command.antiadvert.desc.content:
Link scanning for your entire guild
[List of preset checks](https://gist.github.com/BluePotatoBP/9415fb46a72480363926c74027307188)
command.antiadvert.args.enable.start: Should the anti-advertising module be enabled? `(enable|disable)`
command.antiadvert.args.enable.retry: Please try again, should the module be enabled? `(enable|disable)`
command.antiadvert.args.includestaff.sta: Should the anti-advertising module check staff? `(includestaff|excludestaff)`
command.antiadvert.args.includestaff.ret: Please try again, should the module check staff? `(includestaff|excludestaff)`
command.antiadvert.args.includebots.star: Should the anti-advertising module check bots? `(includebots|excludebots)`
command.antiadvert.args.includebots.retr: Please try again, should the module check bots? `(includebots|excludebots)`
command.antiadvert.args.warn.start: Should the anti-advertising module warn the user about detected links? `(warn (togglable))`
command.antiadvert.args.warn.retry: Please try again, should the module warn the user about detected links? `(warn (togglable))`
command.antiadvert.args.preset.start: What preset would you like to check for [[?]](https://gist.github.com/BluePotatoBP/9415fb46a72480363926c74027307188 'Click here for the link') `(light|moderate|heavy)`
command.antiadvert.args.preset.retry: Please try again, what preset would you like to check for [[?]](https://gist.github.com/BluePotatoBP/9415fb46a72480363926c74027307188 'Click here for the link') `(light|moderate|heavy)`
